para: TEF, internal called "TourExchangeFormat", is a XML based export format, used by Map&Guide "Motorrad-Routenplaner 2005/06". Another posibility to exchange data with this are the .bcr files, which are supported by GPSbabel in both directions (see BCR).
Via XML this software can only export routing data. So we don't support writing. With the option "routevia" you can eliminate calculated route points from tef source file.
